name: GeometryPuzzler
description:
This game is about picking up the 3D puzzle, just like the stacking blocks of childhood, but a bit more difficult.Current Features
  • original gameplay
  • more than 50 different levels
  • 19 steam achievements
  • relaxing background music
GameplayIn the game you need to place sets of different figures on the platform in the center of the level, in the way that all the figures fit inside a bounded area of green color. All the figures can be moved and rotated. Moving figures is done simply by dragging and dropping the mouse.
